--------------------------------------------------------------------------

In August 1947, India gained its independence. At midnight of this date, two children were born in a maternity hospital. However, a nurse decided to swap them: Saleem, unwanted child of a poor mother, was created in place of Shiva, the biological son of a wealthy couple. The story of two boys will forever be linked with the political destiny of the country, especially when India goes to war, and they find themselves on opposite sides in the battle.
